examples: to take out/repay a loan (= to borrow money/pay it back)
sacar / pagar un préstamo (= pedir dinero prestado / devolverlo)
She took out an $8  000 personal loan.
bank loans with low interest rates
préstamos bancarios con tasas de interés bajas
It took three years to repay my student loan (= money lent to a student).
Me tomó tres años pagar mi préstamo estudiantil (= dinero prestado a un estudiante).
